full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES SHING SHIS PAR BRJOD NAS ME TOG GI CHAR 'BEBS PAR BYA'O, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA DE MCHED 'GROGS AEM CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KYIS ME LHA MCHOD PA ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR NOM CHE KO'U SHI BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
